sentences.en: ‘It’s not fair,’ Jane declared.
sentences.cn: “这不公平。” 简宣称道。

sentences.en: A state of emergency has been declared.
sentences.cn: 已宣布进入紧急状态。

sentences.en: Declare all unearned income .
sentences.cn: 一切非劳动所得的收入都要申报。

sentences.en: declared war on drug dealing in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 向在邻近地段进行的毒品交易宣战

sentences.en: Have you anything to declare?
sentences.cn: 你有东西要申报 吗 ?(指应纳税的东西)

sentences.en: Have you got anything to declare?
sentences.cn: 你有什么东西需要报关的 吗 ?

sentences.en: He declared he would not run for a second term as president.
sentences.cn: 他声明不再竞选连任总统。

sentences.en: He declared his intention to become the best golfer in the world.
sentences.cn: 他表明了要成为世界上最佳高尔夫球手的意愿。

sentences.en: He declared that he was in love with her.
sentences.cn: 他声称他已爱上她。

sentences.en: He should declare at customs.
sentences.cn: 他应该报关.

sentences.en: I declare, it was a very warm day!
sentences.cn: 天哪, 真暖和!

sentences.en: I won't declare my view to what he had said.
sentences.cn: 我不会就他的话来阐述我的观点的.

sentences.en: If you insist, we have to declare the meeting off.
sentences.cn: 如果你坚持的话, 我们不得不取消这次会议.

sentences.en: It's too early to declare his efforts a success.
sentences.cn: 现在就断言他的努力已经获得成功还为时过早。

sentences.en: Mother said, " I declare, Joe, you've grown a foot.
sentences.cn: ”妈妈说 “ 啊, 乔, 你又长高了一英尺. ”

sentences.en: Mr Steel has been declared bankrupt
sentences.cn: 斯蒂尔先生被宣布破产了。

sentences.en: Our Entente have [ has ] decided to declare war.
sentences.cn: 我 协约国 已决定宣战.

sentences.en: She would willingly forgo a birthday treat if only her warring parents would declare a truce.
sentences.cn: 只要她的父母停止争吵,她愿意放弃生日宴请.

sentences.en: The Congress shall have power to declare the punishment of treason.
sentences.cn: 国会有权宣布如何惩罚叛国罪.

sentences.en: The judge said he would declare a mistrial if the jury did not reach its verdict today.
sentences.cn: 法官说，如果陪审团今天不能作出裁决的话，他就宣布失审。

sentences.en: They decided to declare Paris an open city.
sentences.cn: 他们决定宣布巴黎为不设防城市.

sentences.en: We celebrate September 16, the day when Mexico declared independence from Spain (= officially stated that it was no longer ruled by Spain ) .
sentences.cn: 我们在9月16日举行庆祝活动，这一天是墨西哥摆脱西班牙统治宣布独立的日子。

sentences.en: Which do they want me to do? declare war or surrender?
sentences.cn: 他们想让我做什么，宣战还是投降？

words.tran_cn: （纳税品等的）申报；宣布；公告；申诉书

phrases.tran_cn: ［表示不信、吃惊或恼怒的感叹用语］ 唉，真难以置信！真怪！

trans.tran_cn: 宣称，表明，断言，公布，申报，（在击球员还未全部出局时）宣布结束赛局
trans.tran_en: to state officially and publicly that a particular situation exists or that something is true
If you declare that something is true, you say that it is true in a firm, deliberate way. You can also declare an attitude or intention.

trans.tran_cn: 宣布，宣告，声明；断言，宣称；申报
trans.tran_en: to state officially and publicly that a particular situation exists or that something is true
